ul.li1: 1For the sake of Zion I will not be silent,
ul.li2: and for the sake of Jerusalem I will not maintain a quiet attitude,
ul.li1: until her righteousness goes out like the bright light,
ul.li2: and her salvation burns like a torch.
ul.li1: 2And the nations shall see your righteousness,
ul.li2: and all the kings your glory,
ul.li1: and you will be calledLiterally “it shall be called to you” a new name
ul.li2: that the mouth of Yahweh will designate.
ul.li1: 3And you shall be a crown of beauty in the hand of Yahweh,
ul.li2: and a headband of royalty in the hand of your God.
ul.li1: 4It shall no longer be said of you, “Forsaken,”
ul.li2: and it shall no longer be said of your land, “Desolation!”
ul.li1: but you willLiterally “to you it shall” be called “My Delight Is In Her,”
ul.li2: and your land, “Married,”
and your land shall be married.
ul.li1: 5For as a young man marries a virgin,
ul.li2: so shall your sons marry you,
ul.li1: and as is the joy of the bridegroom over the bride,
ul.li2: so shall your God rejoice over you.
ul.li1: 6I have appointed watchmen upon your walls, Jerusalem;
ul.li2: all day and all night they shall never be silent.
ul.li1: You who profess Yahweh have no rest.
ul.li2: 7And you must not give him rest until he establishes,
ul.li3: and until he makesLiterally “places” Jerusalem an object of praiseLiterally “a praise” in the earth.
ul.li1: 8Yahweh has sworn by his right hand,
ul.li2: and by his mighty arm,Literally “the arm of his might”
ul.li1: “Surely I will never again give your grain as food to your enemies,Literally “those who are hostile to you”
ul.li2: and surely foreignersLiterally “sons of a foreign country” shall not drink your new wine at which you have labored.”
ul.li1: 9But those who gather it shall eat it, and they shall praise Yahweh,
ul.li2: and those who gather it shall drink it in my holy courts.Literally “the courts of my holiness”
Make the way clear forLiterally “of” the people!
ul.li1: Pile up, pile up the highway; clear it of stones!Hebrew “stone”
ul.li2: Lift up an ensign over the peoples!

chapter.p: 11Look! Yahweh has proclaimed to the end of the earth:

ul.li1: Say to daughter Zion, “Look, your salvation is coming!
ul.li2: Look, his reward is with him,
and his reward before him.
ul.li1: 12And they shall call them “The Holy People,Literally “People of the Holiness” The Redeemed Of Yahweh,”
ul.li2: and youLiterally “to you it” shall be called “Sought After, A City Is Not Forsaken.”
